title: COVID-19 Vaccinations | Western Victoria Primary Health Network
description: Primary health providers have an important role in administering COVID-19 vaccines and helping ensure the community has access to accurate and up-to-date information
cleaned_text: Western Victoria's primary health providers have an important role in administering COVID-19 vaccines as well as helping ensure the community has access to accurate and up-to-date information on the vaccine roll-out across our region. To find local clinics providing COVID-19 vaccines please refer to the [Vaccine Clinic Finder](https://covid-vaccine.healthdirect.gov.au/booking/) For vaccine providers - HealthPathways COVID-19 vaccination pages >> [westvic.communityhealthpathways.org/839877.htm](https://westvic.communityhealthpathways.org/839877.htm) - Advice and Information for COVID-19 vaccination providers >> [health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/information-for-covid-19-vaccination-providers](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/information-for-covid-19-vaccination-providers) - COVID-19 vaccine - Clinical considerations >> [health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/information-for-covid-19-vaccination-providers/covid-19-vaccine-clinical-considerations](https://www.health.gov.au/initiatives-and-programs/covid-19-vaccines/information-for-covid-19-vaccination-providers/covid-19-vaccine-clinical-considerations) - COVID-19 Vaccine MBS items >> [servicesaustralia.gov.au/changes-to-mbs-items-during-coronavirus-covid-19-response](https://www.servicesaustralia.gov.au/changes-to-mbs-items-during-coronavirus-covid-19-response?context=20) - Vaccine safety monitoring and reporting >> [tga.gov.au/covid-19-vaccine-safety-monitoring-and-reporting](https://www.tga.gov.au/covid-19-vaccine-safety-monitoring-and-reporting) - COVID-19 vaccination decision guide for frail older people, including those in residential aged care facilities >> [health.gov.au/sites/default/files/documents/2021/02/covid-19-vaccination-covid-19-vaccination-decision-guide-for-frail-older-people-including-those-in-residential-aged-care-facilities.pdf](https://www.health.gov.au/resources/publications/covid-19-vaccination-shared-decision-making-guide-for-frail-older-people-including-those-in-residential-aged-care-facilities) - COVID-19 Vaccine Side Effect Checker >> [healthdirect.gov.au/covid-19-vaccine-side-effect-checker](https://www.healthdirect.gov.au/covid-19-vaccine-side-effect-checker) - Vaccine dose policy >> [health.gov.au/resources/publications/covid-19-vaccination-vaccine-dose-policy](https://www.health.gov.au/resources/publications/covid-19-vaccination-vaccine-dose-policy) - Victorian COVID-19 Vaccination Guidelines >> [coronavirus.vic.gov.au/victorian-covid-19-vaccination-guidelines](https://www.coronavirus.vic.gov.au/victorian-covid-19-vaccination-guidelines) Health provider training - COVID-19 Vaccination training for immunisers >> [covid19vaccinationtraining.org.au/login/index.php](https://covid19vaccinationtraining.org.au/login/index.php) - Victorian COVID-19 e-Learning Competency (pre-requisite training for Victorian emergency authorised registered health professionals to administer COVID -19 vaccines in Victoria) >> [education-mvec.mcri.edu.au/courses/dh-covid19](https://education-mvec.mcri.edu.au/courses/dh-covid19/) - Victorian COVID-19 AstraZeneca Supplementary eLearning >> [education-mvec.mcri.edu.au/courses/covid19az](https://education-mvec.mcri.edu.au/courses/covid19az/) Information on the vaccines - Therapeutic Goods Administration COVID-19 Vaccines >> [tga.gov.au/covid-19-vaccines](https://www.tga.gov.au/covid-19-vaccines) - AusVaxSafety COVID-19 Vaccine Safety Surveillance >> [ausvaxsafety.org.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccine-safety-surveillance](https://www.ausvaxsafety.org.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccine-safety-surveillance) -
